content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dp203azuresynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/dp203azuresynapse-file-storage/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ContosoLake
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://dp203azuresynapse.dfs.core.windows.net')

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/dp203azuresynapse-file-storage/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'ContosoLake',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
